name: Black Leather Rebel Jacket
description: Embrace the urban edge with this sleek leather jacket. Crafted from premium faux leather, it features a satin lining for comfort. Perfect for the modern adventurer, this jacket exudes confidence and style. Material: Faux Leather. Care: Dry clean only.

name: Brick Brown Harmony Top
description: Effortlessly chic, this top brings warmth and style together. Made from a breathable cotton blend fabric, it offers both comfort and versatility. Perfect for layering or wearing on its own, this top is a staple for any wardrobe. Material: Cotton blend. Care: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low.

name: Brown Checkmate Coat
description: Step out in sophistication with this checkered coat. Crafted from a luxurious wool blend, it provides both warmth and elegance. Featuring a tailored fit and timeless design, this coat is perfect for formal occasions or everyday wear. Material: Wool blend. Care: Dry clean only.

name: Chocolate Dream Coat
description: Wrap yourself in luxury with this rich chocolate coat. Crafted from a plush cashmere blend, it offers superior softness and warmth. Designed for comfort and style, this coat is a must-have for the discerning fashionista. Material: Cashmere blend. Care: Dry clean only.

name: Cocoa Elegance Sweater
description: Indulge in warmth with this cozy cocoa sweater. Knitted from fine merino wool, it offers a luxurious feel and exceptional durability. Perfect for chilly days or evenings, this sweater combines comfort with timeless elegance. Material: Merino wool. Care: Hand wash cold, reshape and dry flat.

name: Floral Noir Delight Top
description: Revel in floral splendor with this noir delight top. Made from lightweight chiffon fabric, it offers an airy and graceful drape. Perfect for both casual outings and special occasions, this top adds a touch of femininity to any outfit. Material: Chiffon. Care: Machine wash cold, gentle cycle.

name: Purple Bloom Fantasy Top
description: Let your style bloom with this purple fantasy top. Crafted from silky satin fabric, it offers a smooth touch and luxurious sheen. Designed to make a statement, this top is ideal for adding a pop of color to any wardrobe. Material: Satin. Care: Hand wash cold, line dry.

name: Meadow Blossom Top
description: Embrace the beauty of nature with this meadow blossom top. Made from eco-friendly bamboo fabric, it offers a soft and sustainable choice. Featuring a delicate floral print, this top brings a touch of freshness to any ensemble. Material: Bamboo. Care: Machine wash cold, gentle cycle.

name: Emerald Enchantment Gown
description: Make a statement in emerald with this enchanting gown. Crafted from shimmering satin fabric, it offers a luxurious feel and elegant silhouette. Perfect for special occasions, this gown ensures you stand out with style. Material: Satin. Care: Dry clean only.

name: Blush Blossom Cardigan
description: Wrap yourself in elegance with this blush blossom cardigan. Knitted from soft cashmere, it offers a luxurious touch and exceptional warmth. Perfect for layering, this cardigan adds a touch of sophistication to any outfit. Material: Cashmere. Care: Dry clean only.

name: Rose Quartz Satin Gown
description: Drape yourself in luxury with this rose quartz satin gown. Crafted from flowing satin fabric, it offers a graceful silhouette and flattering fit. Perfect for formal events, this gown ensures timeless elegance. Material: Satin. Care: Dry clean only.

name: Snow White Net Top
description: Add a touch of sophistication with this snow white net top. Made from delicate lace and mesh, it offers an ethereal and romantic look. Perfect for layering or wearing on its own, this top is a versatile addition to your wardrobe. Material: Lace, Mesh. Care: Hand wash cold, line dry.

name: Ivory Snowflake Sweater
description: Stay cozy and stylish with this ivory snowflake sweater. Knitted from soft wool, it offers warmth and comfort during the colder months. Featuring a classic design, this sweater is a timeless addition to your winter wardrobe. Material: Wool. Care: Hand wash cold, reshape and dry flat.

name: Beige Frost Winter Jacket
description: Brave the elements in style with this beige frost winter jacket. Made from a durable nylon blend fabric, it offers both warmth and protection. Featuring a versatile design, this jacket is ideal for outdoor adventures or everyday wear. Material: Nylon blend. Care: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low.
